00011 ThreadPool::ThreadPool(int maxThreads)
00012 {
00013    if (maxThreads < 1)  maxThreads=1;
00014    
00015    mutexSync = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
00016    mutexWorkCompletion = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
00017    
00018    pthread_mutex_lock(&mutexSync);
00019    this->maxThreads = maxThreads;
00020    this->queueSize = maxThreads;
00021    workerQueue = new WorkerThread*[maxThreads];
00022    topIndex = 0;
00023    bottomIndex = 0;
00024    incompleteWork = 0;
00025    sem_init(&availableWork, 0, 0);
00026    sem_init(&availableThreads, 0, queueSize);
00027    pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutexSync);
00028 }
00029 
00030 void ThreadPool::initializeThreads()
00031 {
00032    for(int i = 0; i<maxThreads; ++i)
00033         {
00034                 pthread_t tempThread;
00035                 pthread_create(&tempThread, NULL, &ThreadPool::threadExecute, (void *) this ); 
00036                  //threadIdVec[i] = tempThread;
00037    }
00038 
00039 }

00043 }

00047 void ThreadPool::destroyPool(int maxPollSecs = 5)
00048 {
00049         while( incompleteWork>0 )
00050         {
00051         //cout << "Work is still incomplete=" << incompleteWork << endl;
00052                 sleep(maxPollSecs);
00053         }
00054         cout << "All Done!! Wow! That was a lot of work!" << endl;
00055         sem_destroy(&availableWork);
00056         sem_destroy(&availableThreads);
00057 }

00059 
00060 bool ThreadPool::assignWork(WorkerThread *workerThread)
00061 {
00062         pthread_mutex_lock(&mutexWorkCompletion);
00063                 incompleteWork++;
00064                 //cout << "assignWork...incomapleteWork=" << incompleteWork << endl;
00065         pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutexWorkCompletion);
00066     
00067         sem_wait(&availableThreads);
00068         
00069         pthread_mutex_lock(&mutexSync);
00070                 //workerVec[topIndex] = workerThread;
00071                 workerQueue[topIndex] = workerThread;
00072                 if(queueSize !=1 )
00073                         topIndex = (topIndex++) % (queueSize-1);
00074                 sem_post(&availableWork);
00075         pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutexSync);
00076         return true;
00077 }
00078 
00079 bool ThreadPool::fetchWork(WorkerThread **workerArg)
00080 {
00081         sem_wait(&availableWork);
00082 
00083         pthread_mutex_lock(&mutexSync);
00084                 WorkerThread * workerThread = workerQueue[bottomIndex];
00085                 *workerArg = workerThread;
00086                 if(queueSize !=1 )
00087                         bottomIndex = (bottomIndex++) % (queueSize-1);
00088                 sem_post(&availableThreads);
00089         pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutexSync);
00090     return true;
00091 }
00092 
00093 void *ThreadPool::threadExecute(void *param)
00094 {
00095         WorkerThread *worker = NULL;
00096         
00097         while(((ThreadPool *)param)->fetchWork(&worker))
00098         {
00099                 if(worker)
00100                         worker->executeThis();
00101 
00102                 pthread_mutex_lock( &(((ThreadPool *)param)->mutexWorkCompletion) );
00103                         ((ThreadPool *)param)->incompleteWork--;
00104                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &(((ThreadPool *)param)->mutexWorkCompletion) );
00105         }
00106         return 0;
00107 }
